summary: Young Jim Craig returns to his home in the Australian high country. He finds that things are not as he left them - his girlfriend is being pursued by another man, and her father doesn't want Jim back into her life.
cast: Tom Burlinson|Sigrid Thornton|Brian Dennehy|Nicholas Eadie|Mark Hembrow|Bryan Marshall|Rhys McConnochie|Peter Cummins|Cornelia Frances|Tony Barry|Wyn Roberts|Alec Wilson|Peter Browne|Alan Hopgood|Mark Pennell|Charlie Lovick|Wayne Lovick|Greg Stroud|Nick Waters|Cae Rees|Johnny Raaen|Bruce Clarkson|Peter Tulloch|Christopher Stevenson|Geoff Beamish|Gerald Egan|Graeme Stoney|Ken Connley|Rusty Connley|Clive Hodges|Kevin Higgins|Jim Campbell|Graeme Fry|John Harper|Kelton Garwood|Lloyd Parkes|Noel Elliott|Tony Lovick|Greg Purcell|Rob Purcell|Dick Forrest|John Coombes|Kevin Stower|Paul Purcell|Keith Nicholson|Bruce McCormack|Max Scanlon|Basil Egan|Wayne Anderson|Robert Gough|Barry Stephen|Curly McCormack|Wayne Pinder|Graig Edwards|Gary Neil|Dennis Vickery|Julien Welsh|Tony Larkins|John Bird|Steve Harrison|Derek Scott|John Lovick|Graydon Marks|Col Reynolds|Chris Stoney|Brendan Purcell|Peter Purcell|John Klingsporn|Max Jeffries|Mark Arbuthnot|Martin Myors|Peter McElroy|John Johnston|Brendan Egan|Steve Arbuthnot|Kylie Foster|Megyn Shott
title: The Man from Snowy River II
